svg.text: Week in Ethereum News - June 3 2023

title: "Week in Ethereum News
June 3, 2023" date: "2023-06-03"
Eth News and Links
Dencun (Cancun + Deneb) upgrade
• Latest all core devs - consensus (ACDC) call video . Notes from Christine Kim : Discussions on
bounding EIP4788 (beacon root in EVM), implementation complexity of EIP6988 (prevent slashed validator
being elected block proposer) and Engine API versioning Dankrad tested big blocks on mainnet to size
safe blobs per block, recommends increasing blobs per block target to 3 with a maximum of 6, up from 2
& 4 respectively
Latest all core devs - consensus (ACDC) call video . Notes from Christine Kim :
• Discussions on bounding EIP4788 (beacon root in EVM), implementation complexity of EIP6988 (prevent
slashed validator being elected block proposer) and Engine API versioning
Discussions on bounding EIP4788 (beacon root in EVM), implementation complexity of EIP6988 (prevent
• Dankrad tested big blocks on mainnet to size safe blobs per block, recommends increasing blobs per
block target to 3 with a maximum of 6, up from 2 & 4 respectively
Dankrad tested big blocks on mainnet to size safe blobs per block, recommends increasing blobs per
• EIP4844: Latest EIP4844 implementer call video . Notes from Terence : Engine API versioning, add
data_gas_used to execution header and devnet 6 scope Terence: validator & builder interaction with
blob transactions in Dencun KZG ceremony hit 100k contributions , available to anyone with 16 mainnet
transactions
• Latest EIP4844 implementer call video . Notes from Terence : Engine API versioning, add
data_gas_used to execution header and devnet 6 scope
Latest EIP4844 implementer call video . Notes from Terence : Engine API versioning, add data_gas_used
to execution header and devnet 6 scope
• Terence: validator & builder interaction with blob transactions in Dencun
Terence: validator & builder interaction with blob transactions in Dencun
• KZG ceremony hit 100k contributions , available to anyone with 16 mainnet transactions
KZG ceremony hit 100k contributions , available to anyone with 16 mainnet transactions
• Consensus-specs v1.4.0-alpha.1 : adds data_gas_used and changes excess_data_gas & data_gas_used type
from uint256 to uint64
Consensus-specs v1.4.0-alpha.1 : adds data_gas_used and changes excess_data_gas & data_gas_used type
Layer 1
• EthStaker: node operators should use minority execution clients (not Geth)
EthStaker: node operators should use minority execution clients (not Geth)
• Guide to beacon chain networking components : p2p overlays & GossipSub
Guide to beacon chain networking components : p2p overlays & GossipSub
• Intents in account abstraction , they are great but come with risks of block production
centralization, trust-based barriers to entry and lack of transparency
Intents in account abstraction , they are great but come with risks of block production
• Ethereum halving proposal : reduce staking requirement from 32 ETH to 1 ETH over 8 years, thanks to
hardware & client improvements
Ethereum halving proposal : reduce staking requirement from 32 ETH to 1 ETH over 8 years, thanks to
Client releases
• Execution layer: Besu v23.4.1 : experimental transaction pool for more profitable local block
production Erigon v2.44.0 : Caplin (embedded CL) improvements, added new Sepolia testnet bootnodes
Nethermind v1.19.0 : faster sync and reduced database size (fresh sync required for full benefits of
disk space optimization)
• Besu v23.4.1 : experimental transaction pool for more profitable local block production
Besu v23.4.1 : experimental transaction pool for more profitable local block production
• Erigon v2.44.0 : Caplin (embedded CL) improvements, added new Sepolia testnet bootnodes
Erigon v2.44.0 : Caplin (embedded CL) improvements, added new Sepolia testnet bootnodes
• Nethermind v1.19.0 : faster sync and reduced database size (fresh sync required for full benefits of
For Stakers
• Validator queue dashboard with historical charts
Research
• Longitudinal study of block construction market : measures MEV-Boost & money flows and introduces a
MEV-time law
Layer 2
• RFP to build zk validity prover for OP Stack
RFP to build zk validity prover for OP Stack
• Kinto (optimistic rollup, KYC users only) live on testnet
Kinto (optimistic rollup, KYC users only) live on testnet
• Norswap: rollup definition debate is noise , focus on the specific security assumptions
Norswap: rollup definition debate is noise , focus on the specific security assumptions
• Polygon zkEVM vulnerability disclosed , could DoS sequencer & prover
Polygon zkEVM vulnerability disclosed , could DoS sequencer & prover
EIPs/Standards
• ERCs: ERC7085 : NFT relationship enhancement ERC7087 : MIME type for web3 URL in auto mode ERC7092 :
Financial bonds ERC7093 : Social recovery interface ERC7099 : Offchain checks (for low cost ERC20
distribution) ERC7108 : Clustered ERC721 ERC7110 : NFT dynamic ownership ERC7121 : SoulBounds
Interface (soulbound assets ERC1155 extension)
• ERC7085 : NFT relationship enhancement
ERC7085 : NFT relationship enhancement
• ERC7087 : MIME type for web3 URL in auto mode
ERC7087 : MIME type for web3 URL in auto mode
• ERC7092 : Financial bonds
ERC7092 : Financial bonds
• ERC7093 : Social recovery interface
ERC7093 : Social recovery interface
• ERC7099 : Offchain checks (for low cost ERC20 distribution)
ERC7099 : Offchain checks (for low cost ERC20 distribution)
• ERC7108 : Clustered ERC721
ERC7108 : Clustered ERC721
• ERC7110 : NFT dynamic ownership
ERC7110 : NFT dynamic ownership
• ERC7121 : SoulBounds Interface (soulbound assets ERC1155 extension)
ERC7121 : SoulBounds Interface (soulbound assets ERC1155 extension)
Stuff for developers
• Rinkeby testnet was shutdown
Rinkeby testnet was shutdown
• Foundry: Iron wallet : dev focused browser extension wallet, Anvil aware Tip: print colorful logs
using console2 & StdStyle Tip: fuzz private keys using boundPrivateKey
Foundry:
• Iron wallet : dev focused browser extension wallet, Anvil aware
Iron wallet : dev focused browser extension wallet, Anvil aware
• Tip: print colorful logs using console2 & StdStyle
Tip: print colorful logs using console2 & StdStyle
• Tip: fuzz private keys using boundPrivateKey
Tip: fuzz private keys using boundPrivateKey
• Zipped contracts : low cost deployment for contracts called offchain, self-extracts when called
Zipped contracts : low cost deployment for contracts called offchain, self-extracts when called
• Pack structs manually for ~200-300 gas saving per struct change
Pack structs manually for ~200-300 gas saving per struct change
• N-per-epoch : modifier to rate limit a contract function call by humans
N-per-epoch : modifier to rate limit a contract function call by humans
• Cookbook VS Code extension : find contracts from Cookbook registry
Cookbook VS Code extension : find contracts from Cookbook registry
• Ape v0.6.10 : event log comparison, historical log optimization, account option flag for test
accounts
Ape v0.6.10 : event log comparison, historical log optimization, account option flag for test accounts
• EVM CFG : control flow graph generator for unverified contracts using symbolic stack analysis
EVM CFG : control flow graph generator for unverified contracts using symbolic stack analysis
• Hardhat-ethers v3 : Ethers.js v6 support
Hardhat-ethers v3 : Ethers.js v6 support
• Ethers-rs v2.0.6 : support Optimism deposited transactions
Ethers-rs v2.0.6 : support Optimism deposited transactions
• GuardianTest : end to end testing, uses Playwright, injects a wallet connected to Anvil network fork
GuardianTest : end to end testing, uses Playwright, injects a wallet connected to Anvil network fork
• Armchair (app starter kit): Next.js app router & server actions, Sign in with Ethereum
Armchair (app starter kit): Next.js app router & server actions, Sign in with Ethereum
• CTFs: Curta CTF Labyrinth solution Secureum RACE #18: 8 question Solidity quiz & answers GPT-4 plays
Ethernaut : 19/23 for older levels in the training data, 1/5 for new levels
CTFs:
• Curta CTF Labyrinth solution
Curta CTF Labyrinth solution
• Secureum RACE #18: 8 question Solidity quiz & answers
Secureum RACE #18: 8 question Solidity quiz & answers
• GPT-4 plays Ethernaut : 19/23 for older levels in the training data, 1/5 for new levels
GPT-4 plays Ethernaut : 19/23 for older levels in the training data, 1/5 for new levels
Security
• Jimbo v2 (semi-stablecoin) $7.5 million exploit on Arbitrum via lack of slippage control
Jimbo v2 (semi-stablecoin) $7.5 million exploit on Arbitrum via lack of slippage control
• El Dorado Exchange (EDE) $680k exploit on Arbitrum via oracle manipulation
El Dorado Exchange (EDE) $680k exploit on Arbitrum via oracle manipulation
• unshETH $375k taken after deployer private key shared on GitHub
unshETH $375k taken after deployer private key shared on GitHub
• Open Standard Web3 Attack Reference (OSWAR): framework to identify, categorize & mitigate attacks &
vulnerabilities
Open Standard Web3 Attack Reference (OSWAR): framework to identify, categorize & mitigate attacks &
Ecosystem
• Lido is over 36% of staked ETH Reminder: don’t allocate capital to LSDs exceeding 25% of staked ETH
Lido is over 36% of staked ETH
• Reminder: don’t allocate capital to LSDs exceeding 25% of staked ETH
• Ethereum Protocol Fellowship cohort four applications are open
Ethereum Protocol Fellowship cohort four applications are open
• Etherscan adds advanced filters for transaction searches, beta
Etherscan adds advanced filters for transaction searches, beta
• ETHDublin hackathon projects
ETHDublin hackathon projects
Notable at app layer
• Circle launching native USDC on Arbitrum on June 8, bridged token renamed to USDC.e
Circle launching native USDC on Arbitrum on June 8, bridged token renamed to USDC.e
• Curve Tricrypto-ng (next generation of pools) deployed, swap gas costs halved
Curve Tricrypto-ng (next generation of pools) deployed, swap gas costs halved
Job Listings
• Devconnect Istanbul: Production Assistant and Volunteer Coordinator
Devconnect Istanbul: Production Assistant and Volunteer Coordinator
• Protocol Engineer (DeFi) sought by Tunnel Vision Labs
Protocol Engineer (DeFi) sought by Tunnel Vision Labs
• Solidity team need a highly skilled Developer Advocate
Solidity team need a highly skilled Developer Advocate
Job listings: $600 for four issues (75 character limit), payable to abcoathup.eth. Questions?
abcoathup at-gmail
Regulation/business/tokens
• US SEC settled with former Coinbase staffer on insider trading charges to avoid having to prove that
any of the tokens were securities
General/crypto
• Blockchain censorship : effect of OFAC sanctions on Ethereum & Bitcoin
Blockchain censorship : effect of OFAC sanctions on Ethereum & Bitcoin
• iMessage zero-click exploit
iMessage zero-click exploit
Follow @WeekinEthNews to find out what the most clicked links are. Follow @abcoathup and
@evan_van_ness to get most of the week’s news in real time.
Permalink for this week’s issue: https://weekinethereumnews.com/week-in-ethereum-news-june-3-2023
